title: Unearthing Ancient Giants: Bolivia’s Dinosaur Footprint Treasure
description: In Bolivias breathtaking Toro Toro paleontologists have unveiled a colossal find16600 dinosaur footprints the worlds highest recorded tally for theropods These remarkable tracks belong to the fearsome dinosaur group that includes the infamous Tyrannosaurus rex

title: The ancient grain that works wonders on your gut
description: This gluten-free grain has been served in dishes for more than 7,000 years

title: Human skull stolen from ancient burial site in southern Utah
description: Archeologists are seeking for the public's help after a human skull was illegally removed from an ancient burial site.

title: Ancient pleasure boat with Greek inscriptions discovered off Alexandria
description: Archaeologists have uncovered the wreck of a pleasure boat dating back roughly 2,000 years in the bay of Alexandria, Egypt, the European Institute of Underwater Archaeology (IEASM) has announced.
